Build a new vesalius_assay object using mapping information

Source: R/objects.R
build_mapped_assay.Rd

Build a new vesalius_assay object using mapping information

Usage

build_mapped_assay(mapped, seed_assay, query_assay, meta_labels, jitter = 0)

Arguments

mapped

mapping results (see output of point_mapping)

seed_assay

vesalius_assay object used as reference

query_assay

vesalius_assay that was mapped onto the reference

meta_labels

character - name of column to be transfered to new object

jitter

numeric - how much coordiate jitter should be added to the coordinates to avoid duplication. If 0, no jitter will be added.

Value

vesalius_assay object with new coordinates.

Details

This function will only return a vesalius_assay with new coordinates and mapping inforation such as cost. The rest will remain the same. We are only transfering coordinates here. No integration.
